basisSet.dc:title: d-aug-cc-pV6Z
basisSet.dct:abstract: V6Z5P Valence Sextuple Zeta + Polarization + Diffuse
basisSet.dc:description: Doubly Augmented cc-pV6Z Basis ------------------------------ Elements Contraction References H : (12s,7p,6d,5f,4g,3h) -> [8s,7p,6d,5f,4g,3h] K.A. Peterson and D.E. Woon, (unpublished) B - O : (18s,12p,7d,6f,5g,4h,2i) -> [9s,8p,7d,6f,5g,4h,2i] A.K. Wilson, T. v. Mourik and T.H. Dunning, Jr., J. Mol. Struct. (THEOCHEM) 388, 339 (1997). The second shell of diffuse functions is from D.E. Woon and T.H. Dunning, Jr., J. Chem. Phys. 100, 2975 (1994).
